name: Path Killer
description:
‘Path Killer’ is a top-down shooter with multiple enemies and obstacles to overcome.
The player will follow a football player as he dribbles past enemies, while the player clears a path for him.

Experience the challenge firsthand, and defeat the opponent by scoring.

Use the up and down buttons to move your referee player across the screen.
Once you reach the goal, use the left or right button to shoot the ball.
Press the Space button to throw yellow cards & Q to throw red cards.
